title: Is it possible to erase mastery points with a certain champ?
body:
I dont want my shen showing as top 3 id rather have ashe up there but i have like 20k more points on shen so he shows up they are all mastery 7


( this is on a diff acc btw )

replies.body: Currently, there's no method of resetting mastery points.  The best way to get a specific top three would be to acquire the highest points for them!  Per our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide), you can score points fastery by having more players in a premade rather than going solo.  Good luck!
